document.full_text: yovani gallardo was the second straight pitcher to flirt with a no-hitter at busch stadium, allowing only a single to start the eighth inning for a complete game victory over the cardinals.
document.title: roundup: brewers' gallardo keeps cardinals hitless for 7 innings
lines_and_colors: yovani gallardo was the second straight pitcher to flirt with a no-hitter at busch stadium, allowing only a single to start the eighth inning for a complete game victory over the cardinals.
